name: Captalist Pig
description:
This is the first game I upload, so the quality is horrible but I felt like participating in a jam.

The game is about a pig that can pickup coins. There are diferent endings depending on how many coins you got.

There is a lot of... coin?

The controls are:

Left/Right to move,

and Up to Jump.

The number on the left is how many coins you got and on the right the remaining coins

If you hold ctrl+a+enter+backspace you enter the debug mode where you can jump infinitly, skip and return to rooms (+ and -).
